document_data.caption: A map of eastern Sembia showing Taela's Trail between Ordulin and Surd.
document_data.name: Taela's Trail
document_data.mainbody: '''Taela's Trail''' was a small roadway found in eastern [[Sembia]] that connected [[Ordulin]] in the north with the smaller town of [[Surd]] in the southeast.
document_data.Description: Taela's Trail meandered southeast from Ordulin before reaching Surd near the coast of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.History: Taela's Trail's builder was [[Rorl Ossmran]], a merchant out of Ordulin who lived long before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The roadway bore the name of Rorl's beloved, [[Taela]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
